subject: „ÄêInternship„Äë Internship Opportunities at ITRI: Innovating A Better Future
detailContent:
ITRI International Internship Program
The Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI) is a globally recognized applied technology research organization dedicated to advancing industrial innovation and sustainability. We invite highly motivated students to apply for the ITRI International Internship Program, an opportunity to engage in cutting-edge research, collaborate with leading experts, and gain valuable professional experience.

Why Join the ITRI Internship?
üîπParticipate in advanced research and technology development
üîπWork alongside professionals in key areas: Smart Living, Quality Health, Sustainable Environment, and Resilient Society
üîπEnhance technical skills and career prospects through real-world projects
üîπContribute to innovative solutions that drive industrial and societal progress

Eligibility
üîπStudents with backgrounds in science, engineering, environmental studies, healthcare, or related fields
üîπIndividuals with a strong interest in technology, research, and innovation
üîπStudents seeking to gain international experience and expand their professional network

We encourage qualified candidates to apply and be part of ITRI’s mission to develop forward-thinking solutions for a sustainable and technology-driven future.

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëKing Mongkut‚Äôs University of Technology Thonburi (KMUTT), Thailand
detailContent:
FSci International Internship Program 2025 is now open for applications
 
  • The duration of the program: June 12 to July 25, 2025 (the arrival of the selected students should be on June 10th or 11th, 2025, and the departure between July 29 or 30, 2025).
  • The selected students will receive academic research training in a laboratory, as detailed in the guidance enclosed in the application package.
  • Please note that no tuition fee will be charged for this program. However, there is a program fee of 30,000 THB which will cover the following expenditures:
 
  1.  On-campus dormitory (rent only, utilities not included)
  2.  Research equipment
  3.  Airport pickup and drop-off (only for selected dates)
  4.  Cultural Trip
The details are in the guidance. All students will be asked to give internship reports and presentations. At the end of the program, the students will deliver their final presentations. If the home university authorizes the program as an internship/other course, the student will earn credits according to home university. The authorization of the credits is at the discretion of the home university, and FSci, KMUTT will not be able to interfere with the decision.  

The application package, which includes the program application form, a list of request fields, the poster, and the guidance can be downloaded here: Online download

If you wish to apply to this internship program, kindly send the application documents to oiaintern@nycu.edu.tw with title [Internship Program to KMUTT].

subject: „ÄêGlobal Talent Opportunity„ÄëInternational Marketing Intern
detailContent:
AIESEC Global Talent Program Introduction
AIESEC is the world's largest youth-led nonprofit organization, having established a presence in over 100 countries and territories, dedicated to developing leadership among young people through cross-cultural experiences. Global Talent is an opportunity for young people to develop their leadership skills while completing a professional working experience abroad in fields related to business or engineering.
Benefits of becoming a Global Talent
Are you ready to take your marketing skills to the global stage? üåü 
We are looking for passionate individuals to join us as an International Marketing Intern with AIESEC Global Talent! This is your chance to gain hands-on experience in international markets, collaborate with diverse teams, and enhance your professional skills. Apply now and kick-start your global marketing career!
 
  1. Apply your skills and knowledge in a practical environment.
  2. International Exposure - Experience working in new cultures and industries.
  3. Our programs can help you live the leadership values: (Activating Leadership, Acting Sustainably, Striving for Excellence, Living Diversity, Enjoying Participation and Demonstrating Integrity)
  4. Receive AIESEC Support for Selection (assistance with your application to opportunities and selection process).
>>> Go and seize the opportunity:  Click the Linküî•

üö©Title
International Marketing Intern

üö©Organization name
Green Power Engineering Corporation

üö©Organization description
Green Power Engineering Corporation has the expertise of design and analysis. We have powerful software including ANASYS CFX, DYROBES, VISTA CCM, SOLIDWORK, SIEMENS UG, MASTER CAM and AUTODESK INVENTOR.

We have sophisticated equipment including a 5-Axis machine, 4-Axis machine, 3-Axis machine, and other processing equipment (grinding machine, lathe). We also have great inspection instrument, Moment weight, Coordinate-measuring machine, low-speed balancing machine, high-speed balancing machine and other Nondestructive-Testing (NDT) equipments

üö©Job Description
An International Marketing Intern will become a member of our company's marketing team for your respective country. This role involves market development and data collection specific to your country. As an intern familiar with the target market of your country, we expect you to provide deeper insights and feedback for the marketing of our products. Members of the marketing team will assist the company’s business representatives in overseas markets, requiring interaction with clients and bringing valuable market information to the company.

üö©Main Activities  
  1. Translation and Communication Skills: Responsible for translating company-related documents and letters, and communicating with overseas customers using languages they are familiar with (German/Japanese).  
  2. Overseas Market Research: Responsible for collecting market information for the company, assisting in marketing strategy planning, and identifying new potential customers and market opportunities to support business expansion plans.  
  3. Customer Management: Assist the company in email correspondence with foreign customers and provide product information.
  4. Basic Business Tasks: Present the company's brand and products, and assist with the company's overseas marketing and business activities.
  5. Cross-Cultural Collaboration: Collaborate with colleagues and customers from different backgrounds, leveraging diverse perspectives to drive marketing innovation and growth.
  6. Relevant Product Knowledge Learning: Learn about related machinery and international marketing knowledge.
  7. Other Tasks Assigned by Supervisors.
üö©Work hours&Salary
Monday - Friday,08:00 AM to 05:00 PM 
Salary: TWD 27470 per month

üö©Eligibility
Skills: Market ResearchDatabase, Management, Communication, Detail oriented
Backgrounds: Business administration, Marketing
Languages: German, English, Japanese
Nationalities: Germany, Japan
Minimum study level: Bachelor

üö©Logistics
Provide: Computer
Not Included: Accommodation, Transportation, Food

üö©Process
1. CV screening
2. AIESEC interview
3. Company interview


>>> Go and seize the opportunity: Click the Linküî•

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëCake Resume is Hiring~~
detailContent:
About Cake
Established in 2016 in Taiwan, Cake is an international talent community and platform providing comprehensive solutions for job seekers. By offering AI tools for resumes and portfolios, job search strategies, networking resources, and international job opportunities, Cake meets all needs in career development. With over 7 million users worldwide and
collaborations with over 10,000 companies, Cake helps talent find the most suitable place at different stages of their careers.
Internship Opportunities
  1.  Business Development Intern — Malaysia Market
  2.  Business Operation & Marketing Intern - Vietnam Market
  3.  English Social Media Marketing Intern
Why Cake
  1. Knowledge Growth : We hold workshops periodically to foster a culture of mutual learning and collaboration!
  2. Relaxing Your Mind: We organize various activities to help everyone work happily with a positive attitude!
  3. Comfortable Office Environment: Our office features a beautifully designed open workspace and spacious, comfortable desks. Pets are welcome to keep you company!
  4. Delicious Snacks: We provide a variety of international snacks and drinks. Enjoy and recharge yourself at work!
 
  1.  Salary: 190 TWD/hour (including labor and health insurance)
  2.  IT Equipment: Company-provided Windows laptop / personal laptops are allowed
  3.  Company Location: Cake Taipei HQ (near Exit 6 of Nanjing Fuxing Station, about 2 minutes walk)
  4.  Application Requirements: At least 3 full days of internship per week; preference given to those who can commit for at least 6 months

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëBTQ--Cryptography & Blockchain Research
detailContent:
About BTQ
Founded by a group cryptography experts, scientists, and engineers, BTQ is over 50 people strong with offices in Vancouver, Sydney, Taipei, Toronto, Vaduz, and Seoul.
Company Website
Job Details 
Application Link
Responsibilities:
  1. Assist in designing and prototyping cryptographic protocols for the BTQ network under the guidance of the research team.
  2. Participate in the research and development of blockchain protocols and zero-knowledge proof technologies.
Requirements:
  1. Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science/Engineering, or a related field.
  2. A foundational understanding of Cryptography and blockchain.
  3. Curiosity about unconventional trends and emerging technologies.
  4. Capable of synthesizing information from diverse sources to form informed conclusions, even with incomplete data.
  5. Good communication skills, able to convey complex concepts to a non-technical audience in simple terms.
  6. Open-minded and intellectually curious, willing to explore different research approaches.
Preferred Qualifications:
  1. Courses or projects related to cryptography, distributed systems, and/or formal verification.
  2. Some coding experience, preferably in Python, C/C++, Java, Go, or Rust.
  3. Interest in advanced cryptography concepts such as MPC, zero-knowledge proofs, or threshold signatures.
  4. Eagerness to learn about and contribute to the development and implementation of cryptographic protocols or primitives.
  5. Motivated by the opportunity to teach and learn from team members, enhancing collective expertise in the field.
Application Link

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëNYCU x ASML Internship Program 2025
detailContent:

  1. Current NYCU students (must maintain student status during the internship).

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëNYCU x Delta EMEA Internship Program 2025
detailContent:
About Delta
Corporate Mission -To provide innovative, clean, and energy-efficient solutions for a better tomorrow.

Delta, founded in 1971, is a global provider of power and thermal management solutions. Its mission statement, "To provide innovative, clean and energy-efficient solutions for a better tomorrow," focuses on addressing key environmental issues such as global climate change. As an energy-saving solutions provider with core competencies in power electronics and automation, Delta's business categories include Power Electronics, Mobility, Automation, and Infrastructure.

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëEPISTAR Internship Program is open for application
detailContent:
EPISTAR Story
In 1996, decades before solid-state lighting became today’s ubiquitous commodity and highly-anticipated light sources, a handful of visionaries founded EPISTAR to usher in the LED era. First-hand knowledge and insight led the Ô¨Çedgling EPISTAR to cutting-edge production and engineering innovation in epitaxy. With accumulated expertise and expansive capacity, today EPISTAR sits Ô¨Årmly as the premier global supplier. EPISTAR has already worked with some of the most well-known brands around the world, popularizing LED applications on cell phone screens, laptops, television, and much more. EPISTAR is bringing the beneÔ¨Åcial solid-state lighting into everyday life.

EPISTAR plays a pivotal role in LED’s full commercialization guiding the world into the solid-state lighting era. Today that era is approaching full-bloom in a rapid speed, EPISTAR is better equipped than ever to take on increasing challenges and to illuminate the world.

Management Belief
‚òÜ Innovate and develop products best suited to market needs
‚òÜ Plan and establish a humane work environment
‚òÜ Uphold long-term commitment to employees, shareholders, suppliers, agents and customers can benefit each other, profit sharing
2024 Internship Program is open for application!!
Internship VacanciesÔºöInformation Engineer, Quality Assurance Engineer 
Internship LocationÔºöHsinchu Science Park, Southern Taiwan Science Park
QualificationsÔºö Year 3 and above Senior Student (Open for Local student and International student)
Internship PeriodÔºöat least 6 months

Please apply thru 104 Labor Bank.
Person in chargeÔºö Lisa_You@ennostar.com

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëTCA International Student Training & Internship Program by MODA
detailContent:
Introduction of Talent Circulation Alliance (TCA) 
The program aims to promote talent circulation internationally, cultivate digital talent for industry in Taiwan, and urge a connection between talent and the industry. The ultimate targets are to expand the international talent pool in Taiwan, raise the competitiveness of Taiwanese talent and the industry, and elevate our digital economic energy. This program collaborates with companies and legal entities as training institutions to co-cultivate international digital talent through a variety of training programs and industrial internships.
Application Information Sessions
The application information sessions will be held in Taipei, Taichung, Kaohsiung & Hualien from March 29th to April 12th. Join us and learn more about the TCA program!

Sign up now for the application information session. 

Program Details
The TCA International Student Training & Internship provides opportunities for international and overseas Chinese students to participate in a 5-month training and internship program in Taiwanese industry.

Application Period: March 29th – April 29th 2024
Program Duration: July 1st – November 30th 2024

For more information
TCA Official Website
TCA Facebook

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëMoxa Intern Program
detailContent:
About Moxa
Moxa is a leading provider of edge connectivity, industrial computing, and network infrastructure solutions to enable connectivity for the Industrial Internet of Things. With 35 years of industry experience, Moxa has connected more than 94 million devices worldwide and has a distribution and service network that reaches customers in more than 85 countries. Moxa delivers lasting business value by empowering the industry with reliable networks and sincere service for industrial communications infrastructures.
Moxa Intern Program
  1. Period | 2024.07.01-2024.08.30 | Mon - Fri 9:00-18:00
  2. Salary | Bachelor NTD$ 30,000-33,000 | Master NTD$ 36,000-39,000
  3. Location | New Taipei City, Honhui Plaza
  • Industrial Internet - Dive into real-world industrial internet scenarios/ Tour smart factories and explore laboratories.
  • Mentorship - Engage with professional mentors in mutual learning and exchange.
  • Partnership - Collaborate as a team and build a network with internship peers from various fields.
  • Diversified Training - Participate in bi-weekly soft skills courses, interactive experiences, and diverse learning opportunities.
  • Career Exploration - Chat with senior experts/ Seize pre-employment opportunities.
How to apply
Sign up and complete the application for your preferred position on Moxa Career Section.

More about us | Moxa.work

subject: „ÄêInternship„Äë2024 UMC Summer Internship Program
detailContent:
Introduction
Join the 2024 UMC Summer Internship Program and Dive into the Semiconductor Industry!
Are you eager to delve into the heart of the semiconductor market and ride the wave of innovation?
Collaborating alongside seasoned semiconductor professionals, you'll actively engage in real-world projects, fostering invaluable practical insights. Moreover, seize the chance to transition into a full-time role through our internship program, potentially securing a pre-employment offer ahead of the curve!
Don't miss out—apply now for the 2024 UMC Summer Internship Program and immerse yourself in the dynamic world of semiconductor technology!
Application Details
Qualifications
  1. Students in their final year from bachelor degree and above in EE, Electronics, Physics, Chemistry, Materials Science, Photonics, Computer Science and Information Engineering, Statistics, and other science or engineering related institutes.
  2. Proficiency in Mandarin is a plus
Positions
  1. Research & Development
  2. Process Integration
  3. Manufacturing Process
  4. Data Analysis
Compensation
  1. Monthly salary of NTD 35,000~44,000 and meal subsidies
  2. Accommodation in company dorm with 50% discount
  3. Mentorship, training program and hands-on experience
  4. Opportunity to get a pre-offer letter for full-time job in UMC!
Internship Period
July 1st until August 31st, 2024

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëITRI Internship info for NYCU international students
detailContent:
ITRI Internship info for NYCU international students
There are over 25 internships offered, in fields such as deep learning / machine learning, GAI, LLM, 5G/6G, image processing, robotics, edge computing, and more. Most of the internships will be based on our main campus in Chutung, Hsinchu County.

For non-engineering majors, we need a program assistant at one of our Taipei offices, and another in our HR office in Hsinchu County – both of these openings require Chinese language ability.
 
Many of these openings are looking for a student in Taiwan who can start in March, working part-time during the semester and full-time during summer vacation (and possibly beyond).
For more details, please refer to the below websites
To review all of the position descriptions and to apply, please go to: Internship apply 

For general International Internship Program info, please go to: Internship Program Info

If you have any questions about ITRI or our internship program, feel free to contact talent@itri.org.tw

subject: „ÄêInternship„ÄëJimquant Capital Finance Internship Program
detailContent:
About Us:
Established in 2013, Jimquant Capital is a company focused on financial trading. The main financial products traded by the company include: Stocks, bonds, futures, options, forex, commodities, warrants, ETFs, and various other financial products. We are also specialized in researching the dynamics of financial markets.

Job Description:
Training to become a professional trader.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Learning trading strategies for various international markets.
2. Researching the trading methods of various global financial markets.
There will be at least one mentor for guidance.

Qualifications:
1. Fluent in Vietnamese or Thai (native level).
2. Passionate about trading and possesses a basic understanding of financial products.

Additional Qualifications:
1. Proficient in Python, C#, and SQL syntax.
2. Experience in trading in the Thai or Vietnamese markets.
3. Familiar with the pricing of derivative products.
4. Exceptional mathematical and analytical abilities.
5. Proficient in programming and familiar with Object-Oriented (OO) development concepts.

What We Offer:
1. Salary starting from NT$183 per hour.
2. Labor and health insurance included.
3. Working Days: At least 2.5 days per week.
4. Eligible to attend lectures, which invite many trading masters.
5. If hired as a full-time employee in the future, there is an opportunity for overseas assignment.

How to Apply:
From now on to February 15, 2024, complete a Google Form below:
Application Link

The opportunity of Jimquant Capital Internship Program is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity at our company. To align with the company's future plans, this recruitment aims to find interns proficient in Thai or Vietnamese. Please refrain from applying if you are not proficient in these languages.

subject: „ÄêInternship„Äë2024 Micron Summer Internship
detailContent:
Micron is now hiring for 2024 Summer Internship!
Apply now and seize the chance to explore semiconductor industry!
 
Click on‚ÄØthe link below to‚ÄØjoin‚ÄØthe Micron family!
 
„ÄêWhy Micron?„Äë
Projects and Mentorship: Each intern will take on a 2-month project and be assigned with a mentor who will support on professional issues and provide career development advice.

Team Activities: Immerse yourself in various interesting activities, such as volunteerism, functional sharing, cultural exchange, and senior leader symposium. Micron cares not only about your growth at work, but also your life in Micron.

Early Hiring System: Micron interns have a greater opportunity to be converted to permanent positions after the‚ÄØinternship.‚ÄØ(Pre-employment priority will be given to those who can onboard and graduate between September 2025 and August 2026)
